title: Just right for you! 2 bed, 2 bath. Amazing location in Austell
posting_body: ['Welcome to Birch Landing', 'Rental Information', 'Pricing:', '$1588/Month | 2 Bedroom 2 Bath | 1250 sq ft', 'Lease Term:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'Apartment Amenities', '❖ Air Conditioning/Heating', '❖ Balcony/Patio in Select Units', '❖ Carpet', '❖ Dining Room', '❖ Dishwasher', '❖ Disposal', '❖ Garden Tub', '❖ Handrails', '❖ Hardwood Floors', '❖ High Speed Internet Access', '❖ Kitchen', '❖ Office', '❖ Range', '❖ Refrigerator/Freezer', '❖ Scenic View', '❖ Skylight', '❖ Tub/Shower', '❖ Vaulted Ceiling', '❖ Walk-In Closets', '❖ Washer/Dryer Hookup in Select Units', 'Community Features', '❖ BBQ/Picnic Area', '❖ Business Center', '❖ Conference Room', '❖ Courtesy Patrol', '❖ Fitness Center', '❖ High Speed Internet Available', '❖ Maintenance on site', '❖ Multi Use Room', '❖ Online Services', '❖ Parking', '❖ Planned Social Activities', '❖ Playground', '❖ Property Manager on Site', '❖ Recreational Areas', '❖ Short Term Lease', '❖ Smoke Free', '❖ Storage Space', '❖ Sunrooms', '❖ Tennis Courts', '❖ Townhomes Available', 'About Community', 'Description:', "When you make Birch Landing your new home, you'll step into a world of style, comfort and convenience every time you walk through your front door.", 'Professionally managed by Ventron Management, our one and two bedroom Austell, GA apartments offer exceptional features and top-quality finishes!', 'Location:', '500 Maxham Rd', 'Austell, GA 30168', 'show contact info', 'Office Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Additional Information', 'Pet Policy:', 'We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.', 'There is a maximum of 50lbs combined weight of 2 pets.', 'There is a one-time pet fee of $300.', 'Please call for complete pet policy information.', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Our Management Company:', 'Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '199773CCFCA845']
